channel.title: コントローラーABできました へのコメント

item.title: JunkHack より
item.dc:creator: JunkHack
item.description:
<a href="/2015/09/06/pong-on-arduino-7/#comment-52">Roberto</a> への返信。
Hello, ROBERTO. We are playing happily. Thank you ask them to also introduced to the forum.
item.content:encoded:
Roberto への返信。

Hello, ROBERTO.
We are playing happily.
Thank you ask them to also introduced to the forum.

item.title: Roberto より
item.dc:creator: Roberto
item.description: Dear Junkhack, I put a comment to your nice project here http://forum.arduino.cc/index.php?topic=328631.15 at #18. Thank you for sharing, ciao!
item.content:encoded:
Dear Junkhack,
I put a comment to your nice project here
http://forum.arduino.cc/index.php?topic=328631.15
at #18.
Thank you for sharing,
ciao!
